key_risks: Regulatory risks from changes in housing or zoning laws
Economic sensitivity to interest rates, inflation, and housing demand
Tenant relations and reputation risks from unresolved disputes
Operational risks from market conditions and competition
controversies: BBB complaints about unresolved debt disputes and tenant dissatisfaction
Lobbying spending raising ethical concerns among investors
environmental_issues: None identified; UMH has sustainability initiatives like energy-efficient homes and solar projects
social_issues: Customer complaints regarding tenant disputes and service issues
governance_issues: Lobbying activities potentially influencing regulatory policies
